Summary: bight green cylinder column over top of trees
trends: There have been 5 other sightings in New Albany
There were no other sightings in New Albany on or around July 16th 2006
divs: Sighting DetailsI was sitting with a friend at Bills Five Lakes in new albany facing the Louisville skyline about 10:30 pm when I saw a bright, almost white cylinder shaped beam of light come down from the sky and hover over the top of a tree. It hovered for less than a minute and suddenly shot straight back up the sky out of sight, very rapidly. As soon as I looked over at my friend, she said, "yeh I saw that too" We talked about it for what seemed like only 30 minutes and both agreed it was not something we could explain. The last recollection I have of time was 10:45 but my friend said it had to be very late. I checked my cell phone to see what time it was and it was 1:30 am, so I lost track of over two hours leading me to believe that i was abducted.
